item.title: Capitol Hill braces for high-stakes showdown over $36T US debt crisis
item.description: A new economic projection suggests Congress could be headed for a showdown over the U.S. debt limit by mid-June.

item.title: Hezbollah chief says group lost critical arms supply route from Iran with Syrian ouster of Assad
item.description: Hezbollah lost its most important supply route from Iran through Syria with the fall of dictator Bashar al-Assad, the groupâ€™s chief admitted Sunday.

item.title: Trump allies push for more White House control over Congress' purse strings
item.description: House Republican Rep. Andrew Clyde, R-Ga., is leading the charge to give President-elect Donald Trump more say over how government funding is handled.

item.title: Majority of small businesses anticipate revenue spikes under Trump's 1st year in office: data
